deter.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to stop someone from doing something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results
deter.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The company’s financial difficulties have deterred potential investors.
The security camera was installed to deter people from stealing.
deter.translation[0].definitions[0].note: In everyday English, people usually say put someone off rather than deter someone:
Don’t let a few problems put you off.
